reviews.text:
The wings were cooked perfectly. D-Town Sweet Heat with the honey on the side was a hitter. Pepz house special came out fresh with perfect crusts.

Eric gave amazing service and took care of us after a minor mixup on our order caused a delay. Excellent service recovery Pepz.

We are Anaheim locals, this was our first time here and we will definitely be back. Thanks for the great experience!

Let the pictures speak for themselves, my first time here but my daughter and my sister always come here with the kids,I'm not a pizza fanatic but this place is really good, great for family night, it gets really busy sometimes because the stadium as I was told by my daughter, my grandkids love this place.

We discovered this great eatery during our Disneyland trip, we enjoyed it so much we had to go back a second day! My grandson said that the wings were the best he‚Äôd ever had, and he eats a lot of chicken wings‚Ä¶ lol
Trisha was a gem and so kind and patient with us as we figured out what to order. If we‚Äôre ever in the area again, it‚Äôs a must stop !

UPDATE:  8/14/25
I had a nice conversation with the owner (I think it was) about their system, the pizza having all the goodies in the middle, etc. as described last month. He was very apologetic. This time, everything went well. We didn't, though, try using the automated system or delivery, but ordered directly through their website and picked it up. The pizza was back to its normal, great self.  Thanks for hearing me, Pepz. We'll give the automated way a try again eventually. üòâ
7/14/25 Sadly disappointed...
We have been going there, ordering for delivery or pick up, for decades and have always loved the pizza there. Now AI answers the phone when you call. AI doesn't know what a medium special is, so you have to keep asking for it using different words until AI gets it right.  And it leads you to believe it is adding several pizzas to the order, when it's not.  There is no option to pay over the phone anymore. The delivery person was very nice, but they have a new payment system that doesn't work well...lots is steps to just add a top and pay. Neither Clover nor Square are so complex. We ordered the 16" which used to be large, as we found out when we saw how big it was in person.  About 3" of crust along the edge has scarce to no toppings.  The slice pictured actually has an olive or two in the area, which was unusual. It was like they used the same amount of toppings as they would for a medium and put it on a large crust.
It used to be so easy to order, pay and have it delivered, and the pizza used to be exceptional. I hope they ditch AI and go back to the easy, efficient way they had before and return to making quality pizzas that have toppings all the way to the edge.

Was a great experience. Came due to seeing a tik tok about the Happiest Pizza. Did not disappoint. Kiddos loved the pizza. John was very nice and attentive. Overall recommend really good best pizza I have had.

editorial_summary.overview: Pizzeria with pastas, salads & other Italian specialties served in a family-friendly setting.

recentReviews.text: Don't think I'll be back. The food was decent. But they allow these teenagers come in and run around the restaurant like it's a playground. Running in and out of the restrooms. Throwing things at each other. I was hit with a napkin ball that was thrown at someone from the bathroom. Plus this is post to be a bar. How can you have so many teenagers in here. I told the gentleman at the front that I was very upset about this nonsense. He just kind of shrugged it off like it happens all the time. I packed up the rest of my food and left.

Save your money, $70 for two pizzas is absurd, I should have just denied the order but kids were waiting to eat. Big bearded blonde guy said they keep having to raise their prices so I told him after 15 years I will not be returning. Get two costco pizzas with same quality for $20. Think smarter!!!
We come here to watch football and it‚Äôs always a vibe, the food, the drinks & our server/worker there Margarita Corona always providing excellent customer service. All in all excellent place.
Thanks! Delivery driver was quick and foxy! Food was A+
Food is excellent. Service is great. 10/10‚≠êÔ∏è.

9/4/2025
First time and I was really impressed with the menu options and the taste of the D-Town Sweet Heat pizza. Will definitely be back soon!

Justin went above and beyond to have great customer service, poured me an ice cold beer and the food was great. Staff was super attentive especially Nathan and Aiden. They both checked in with me multiple times and put that chefs kiss on my overall experience. I will definitely be coming back again!!

detailedReviews.author: Ivan Orozco
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Athari
detailedReviews.text: Don't think I'll be back. The food was decent. But they allow these teenagers come in and run around the restaurant like it's a playground. Running in and out of the restrooms. Throwing things at each other. I was hit with a napkin ball that was thrown at someone from the bathroom. Plus this is post to be a bar. How can you have so many teenagers in here. I told the gentleman at the front that I was very upset about this nonsense. He just kind of shrugged it off like it happens all the time. I packed up the rest of my food and left.

detailedReviews.author: Jorge Villanueva
detailedReviews.text: Service is fast and nice

detailedReviews.author: Ryan C.
detailedReviews.text: Save your money, $70 for two pizzas is absurd, I should have just denied the order but kids were waiting to eat. Big bearded blonde guy said they keep having to raise their prices so I told him after 15 years I will not be returning. Get two costco pizzas with same quality for $20. Think smarter!!!

detailedReviews.author: Johnny Estrada
detailedReviews.text: We come here to watch football and it‚Äôs always a vibe, the food, the drinks & our server/worker there Margarita Corona always providing excellent customer service. All in all excellent place.

detailedReviews.author: Kara K
detailedReviews.text: Thanks! Delivery driver was quick and foxy! Food was A+

detailedReviews.author: Olga Hurtado
detailedReviews.text: Food is excellent. Service is great. 10/10‚≠êÔ∏è.

detailedReviews.author: Brent Alban
detailedReviews.text:
9/4/2025
First time and I was really impressed with the menu options and the taste of the D-Town Sweet Heat pizza. Will definitely be back soon!

detailedReviews.author: Troy Sudachris
detailedReviews.text: Justin went above and beyond to have great customer service, poured me an ice cold beer and the food was great. Staff was super attentive especially Nathan and Aiden. They both checked in with me multiple times and put that chefs kiss on my overall experience. I will definitely be coming back again!!

detailedReviews.author: Tina Bergholm
detailedReviews.text: On vacation and ordered a pizza to be delivered.  Blew our minds!!!  Best pizza I‚Äôve ever had.  Absolutely amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Robyn Self
detailedReviews.text: This has to be the best white pizza we‚Äôve had. Dough and sauce were yummy, but what made the biggest difference was the chicken. There was so much of it, you didn‚Äôt have to try to get some in every bite like most chicken pizzas.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Myers
detailedReviews.text: The nicest service, the coolest atmosphere, and the tastiest cheesiest pizza I have ever had hands down. I was so happy to eat at Pepz with my Husband and enjoy such a wonderful pizza with such great service!! Definitely will be back and will definitely be recommending this place!!

detailedReviews.author: Jorie Klinger
detailedReviews.text: We ordered the secret menu Micky pizza. My kids enjoyed it. Unfortunately, service was not great. My husband good. My husband was asked by three different people how they could help him and each walked away and ignored him without an explanation. After ten minutes the fourth person finally got our pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Bethanie Stafford
detailedReviews.text: We were only in town for Disneyland, saw this place on TikTok, came in with high hopes and they didn‚Äôt disappoint at all. Great service, fast, and DELICIOUS food.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Felix
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly employees, Aiden at the front register was the best! Made great conversation and was very helpful all night long, food is amazing would definitely recommend to watch sports games, they have lots of TV's too!

detailedReviews.author: Vivid Verita
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was good, calzone was the best part. Fried zucchini and mozzarella sticks were okay. Really wanted to try the pep zone but 44 dollars is insane. Place is a bit pricey

detailedReviews.author: Martin Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: Make sure you come and check out any style of pizza and any flavor of wings my homegirl Leslie will take care of you no matter what great personality and all around a good time

detailedReviews.author: liliana Villafuerte
detailedReviews.text: Amazing place to hang out with the family !! The food is so delicious too! ü©∑

detailedReviews.author: Julio Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: First time here , ordered a pizza, personal calzone, and lemon pepper and mango habanero wings . Chefs kiss! And that homemade ranch!

detailedReviews.author: Misti C
detailedReviews.text:
UPDATE:  8/14/25
I had a nice conversation with the owner (I think it was) about their system, the pizza having all the goodies in the middle, etc. as described last month. He was very apologetic. This time, everything went well. We didn't, though, try using the automated system or delivery, but ordered directly through their website and picked it up. detailedReviews.author: Aracely Mendiola
detailedReviews.text: Let the pictures speak for themselves, my first time here but my daughter and my sister always come here with the kids,I'm not a pizza fanatic but this place is really good, great for family night, it gets really busy sometimes because the stadium as I was told by my daughter, my grandkids love this place.

detailedReviews.author: Isamar Ramirez
detailedReviews.text: Everything was great and toddler friendly and Abby great server

detailedReviews.author: Casey Salgado
detailedReviews.text: Super awesome staff very helpful

detailedReviews.author: Abraham Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: Muy buena pizza y alitas , recomendado

detailedReviews.author: Linda Clark
detailedReviews.text: Abby was great. Very efficient, friendly and a joy to meet.

detailedReviews.author: RasfxTTV Stax
detailedReviews.text: Always a great experience

detailedReviews.author: Miz Deb
detailedReviews.text:
We discovered this great eatery during our Disneyland trip, we enjoyed it so much we had to go back a second day! My grandson said that the wings were the best he‚Äôd ever had, and he eats a lot of chicken wings‚Ä¶ lol
Trisha was a gem and so kind and patient with us as we figured out what to order. If we‚Äôre ever in the area again, it‚Äôs a must stop !

detailedReviews.author: Kendallmedia Solutions
detailedReviews.text: A very pleasant place to eat

detailedReviews.author: Isaac Dennehy
detailedReviews.text: Loved their food 100%

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Schultz
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been fixated on coming here since I saw a tik tok 3 months ago and it did not disappoint. The doggystyle street hotdog pizza and hot honey Detroit style pizzas are unique and delicious. And the staff was amazing and friendly. They stopped by the table and we had a delightful chat. Lived the welcoming atmosphere. Will come back! Thank you Pepz staff for the wonderful time and memories!

detailedReviews.author: Christine Duran
detailedReviews.text: Food was excellent! Price is reasonable. Great service. Would come back again.

detailedReviews.author: Erin Didio
detailedReviews.text: Great food . A bit expensive but worth it

detailedReviews.author: DJ Stansfield
detailedReviews.text: Good place for a decent pizza. Family friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Martin Ortiz
detailedReviews.text: I found this place close to home and gave it a shot. I‚Äôm really glad I did, the pizza is really, really good. The ingredients were plentiful and fresh, the sauce was full of flavor and the dough was both soft and crunchy. One of the best pizzas I‚Äôve ever had, will definitely recommend and will be returning for more.

detailedReviews.author: Ray
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing! Great food, atmosphere and service! They definitely go above and beyond for their customers and they all help each other. I definitely recommend this place in your Anaheim, CA!

detailedReviews.author: Sara
detailedReviews.text: Delicioso!

detailedReviews.author: Socrates Lopez
detailedReviews.text:
Great place to hang and enjoy a delicious pizza, wings with the family
Kid friendly
Customer service at its best

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Moran
detailedReviews.text: Pizza and wings were great.  Some employees sitting at the bar gave the appearance of being less than interested in helping, while Abby was great and kept the tables clean and brought out whatever you needed.

detailedReviews.author: Thelma Mena
detailedReviews.text: The food was good and everyone was nice especially Abby ‚ò∫Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: kiabeth dominguez
detailedReviews.text: The food was really good I got pizza, the fried chicken was okay. Abby was so sweet! She was so kind and answered our questions, she made the experience more enjoyable with her spirit. Would definitely eat here again to try the different foods. Everyone was really chill and they even have an arcade that my fianc√© loved.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Gudino
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious, hot and fresh. Service was amazing from everyone especially from Abby. Made the experience very welcoming. I will be coming back anytime I‚Äôm in the area

detailedReviews.author: Alondra Chavarria
detailedReviews.text: Was a great experience. Came due to seeing a tik tok about the Happiest Pizza. Did not disappoint. Kiddos loved the pizza. John was very nice and attentive. Overall recommend really good best pizza I have had.

detailedReviews.author: Tehya N
detailedReviews.text: Food was so good! I got a 8 inch of pepperoni and the wings were amazing. Only complaint I could have is the manager and customer service! My friend got the lunch special it didn‚Äôt really specify what time they do there lunch special as there‚Äôs no times on the menu. She had gotten her two slices of pizza and they were very stale and cold. I got my wings first but waited a good 10 minutes for my pizza and drink that I ordered with my wings. When my pizza had came out I let the food runner know that my friends pizza tasted very old. He said that they make their pizza at 11 and that‚Äôs just how it is. And all they do is warm it up in a microwave. That‚Äôs totally fine if that‚Äôs the case but my friend did not want to eat that pizza and no where were we told the pizza was going to be stale and 4 hours old. That could definately be our fault being tourists and not knowing the time they make there pizzas at for lunch special but I don‚Äôt really think anyone would ever pay $12 for stale cold pizza even if it is a ‚Äúgood deal‚Äù so we had let the manager know what was going on and instead of helping us find a solution she was just kind of like maybe get here earlier next time. I told her my friend isn‚Äôt going to eat it, we didn‚Äôt mind paying for the side salad and drink. She ended up leaving for a good 10-15 minutes to figure on the kiosk out how to adjust the check to charge us $7 for the drink and side salad. Like I said it was our idea to pay for the two and just get the pizza out of there but I do feel like good customer service would be to say ‚Äúhey the side salad and drink is on us today since you received cold and stale pizza!‚Äù I spent a good $40 on tipping them, a drink, wings, and pizza. Whereas my other friend also spent atleast $20 on wings and potatoes. Just a shame because the food was awesome but I don‚Äôt understand why businesses treat younger people like they don‚Äôt matter sometimes. But other than that I loved the place!!

detailedReviews.author: Adrian Barajas
detailedReviews.text:
I had a wonderful experience at Pepz Pizza!

The pizza was delicious and the employees Ray and Aaron made sure my order was correct.üëç üéâ

detailedReviews.author: Allen Roman
detailedReviews.text: Found this gem looking for food outside of Disneyland. Great food and service , the pizza was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Eddie Fernandez
detailedReviews.text: Aiden was the man with a cool card trick

detailedReviews.author: Jason Ortiz
detailedReviews.text: give me the 4 out of five Old School pizza party place where to get rid of five it's just a little too pricey

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Herrera
detailedReviews.text: Most wonderful service!!! The waiter made me feel so welcomed and beautiful with compliments! Love coming here

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Landeros
detailedReviews.text: Really good service! Food was great as well! Abby was extremely helpful and a positive attitude, great personality. The calzone was delicious! I'd definitely recommend this place!

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Compton
detailedReviews.text: Good vibes, and Great Food. Abby is amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Jorge Marin
detailedReviews.text:
Wings were very dark
No taste
Pizza bread  not crispy

detailedReviews.author: Ann Marie Lopez
detailedReviews.text:
I found this place on social media thought I would try it out.
I have already been here 3 times. Dine in once was great family atmosphere also great to hang out with friends. I have only had pizza i have not been disappointed

detailedReviews.author: Lorraine Segura
detailedReviews.text: Love this place ! Customer service is great. So many different options to choose from.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Lucero
detailedReviews.text: Everything was amazing. The food, drink, service was amazing. Especially the magic from Aiden. His magic tricks are so fun and engaging and he was so nice to talk to us. Love this place. Can‚Äôt wait to come back.

detailedReviews.author: Letty Solis
detailedReviews.text: The food is amazing. The service is great, the staff were so welcoming.  I will definitely be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Edgar Orona
detailedReviews.text: Our server Abby was amazing , as we were leaving we forgot an item and she ran out to give it back to us , the food was very good as well , they have unique pizzas I‚Äôve never seen anywhere else , they had arcade games as well , it gave the restaurant a god atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Mario Zavala
detailedReviews.text: Very good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Francine Lovato
detailedReviews.text: Sausage on the pizza is GOOD!!!  Limon pepper hot wings are Killer!! Definitely recommend this resturant. Staff is friendly and  they keep it very clean.

detailedReviews.author: Shawn Cornett
detailedReviews.text: Good food

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Mateo
detailedReviews.text: Love Pepz! Food is delicious and staff is very kind. Very kid friendly too.

detailedReviews.author: Joel Garcia
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. üíØ recommend

detailedReviews.author: Baker, L.
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is delicious, but it is expensive and the sizes are quite small.

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Stewart
detailedReviews.text:
The wings were cooked perfectly. D-Town Sweet Heat with the honey on the side was a hitter. Pepz house special came out fresh with perfect crusts.

Eric gave amazing service and took care of us after a minor mixup on our order caused a delay. Excellent service recovery Pepz.

We are Anaheim locals, this was our first time here and we will definitely be back. Thanks for the great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Rebekah Castanon
detailedReviews.text:
This pizza parlor is hands-down one of the best I‚Äôve ever been to. The food is incredible, fresh ingredients, perfectly crispy crust, and flavors that hit every time. But what really sets this place apart are the people. Eric and Leslie are absolute gems!!! Everyone was warm, welcoming, and clearly passionate about what they do.

The vibes are just right, relaxed, friendly, and full of good energy. You can feel the pride in every detail. If you‚Äôre looking for amazing pizza and even better service, this is the spot.

Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Nau
detailedReviews.text: Every single worker was so nice and helpful!! Good food and good prices. Definitely will go back.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Prieto
detailedReviews.text: Abby was a great waitress and very kind!

detailedReviews.author: raygoza9138
detailedReviews.text: Best well cooked wings and really good pizza. Def a must try for any sporting event

detailedReviews.author: Tiffany Santana
detailedReviews.text: This is a perfect spot to hang out with some friends, celebrate something and get some good food. Pizza, wings, pasta, potato wedges - can't go wrong with that. Tons of parking and seating as well. A small arcade inside for the kids and tons of TVs

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the fast and friendly service, with specific mentions of staff members like Margarita Corona and Aiden providing excellent customer service. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza, particularly the D-Town Sweet Heat and white pizza with generous chicken toppings, receives high praise for its taste and quality. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The restaurant is a great place to watch sports games, with a vibrant atmosphere and plenty of TVs, making it a perfect spot for sports enthusiasts. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor customer service and management response - review management can address this concern
Perception of high prices and value concerns - social media marketing can improve this area
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, particularly with teenagers disrupting the dining experience - social media marketing can improve this area
